alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 5:00PM CDT until April 26 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL BOSQUE COUNTY... At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Morgan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. The tornado potential will remain south of the hail core, impacting areas near Lakeside and the western shores of Lake Whitney. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: Move indoors until the storm has passed.
